Nightlight::


Nightlight arrived where Rodimus and the others were. Looking to 
Wheeljack-X and Rodimus, she said "How's Blackfang?"after that she 
looked to Blackfang's body and she said with fear "is he...?"

She didn't dare to complete the prhase.
